articles.title: Heart Preserved Over 24 Hours: New Hope for Transplant Patients - Neuroscience News
articles.description: Groundbreaking research demonstrates a significant advancement in heart transplant preservation, enabling pig hearts to be kept alive for over 24 hours using normothermic ex-vivo heart perfusion (NEHP).

articles.author: Lawson R. Wulsin
articles.title: A psychiatrist explains the startling links between toxic stress and biological aging - PsyPost
articles.description: A recent study found that stress accelerates biological aging in midlife, comparable to smoking and low socioeconomic status, confirming a common belief through four stress measures.

articles.title: Disease that kills Britain's native red squirrel moves north - BBC.com
articles.description: Scientists confirm the death of a red squirrel from the squirrelpox virus in Dunfermline in Fife.

articles.author: Science X
articles.title: Autism and ADHD are linked to disturbed gut flora very early in life - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Disturbed gut flora during the first years of life is associated with diagnoses such as autism and ADHD later in life. This is according to a study led by researchers at the University of Florida and Linköping University and published in the journal Cell.
